caption:
This photograph captures a striking scene at a construction site. It features a worker suspended in mid-air. The worker is harnessed to a vertical cable, which is connected to a large hook and a series of mechanical pulleys or links, suggesting heavy-duty equipment typically used for lifting materials or personnel in construction settings. The person, dressed in safety attire including a helmet and work boots, appears engaged in a specific task or in the process of being transported to or from a work area within the site.

The background shows a clear sky with few clouds, which hints the photo was taken on a fair weather day. To the right of the person in the air, there is a massive concrete structure, possibly a column or pillar, part of the construction framework suggesting that this site is perhaps for a large building or infrastructure project. The overall composition highlights the heights and the risks involved in construction work, as well as the crucial role of safety equipment in such environments.
title: Construction: A beltway bridge across Curtis Bay
